org.apache.ignite.igfs.mapreduce.IgfsTaskArgs

    Package Description
    org.apache.ignite.igfs.mapreduce
    Contains APIs for In-Memory MapReduce over IGFS.

    • Uses of IgfsTaskArgs in org.apache.ignite.igfs.mapreduce

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract IgfsJob IgfsTask.createJob(IgfsPath path, IgfsFileRange range, IgfsTaskArgs<T> args)
      Callback invoked during task map procedure to create job that will process specified split for IGFS file.
      Map<? extends ComputeJob,ClusterNode> IgfsTask.map(List<ClusterNode> subgrid, IgfsTaskArgs<T> args)
      This method is called to map or split grid task into multiple grid jobs.
